definitions.title: gent
definitions.body: (OAram. [[תימא]] Lzb:385; in As Têma Dl:Pa 301f. Schr:KGF 261 ff;= south country, √ [[ימא]] (cf. [[תֵּימָן]], √ [[ימן]]) acc. to Nö:Ency.Bib ISHMAEL);—´[[ישְׁבֵי אֶרֶץ ת]]: Is 21:14, people Je 25:23; ´[[ת]]: ‘son’ of Ishmael Ge 25:5 ‖ 1Ch 1:30; [[אָרְחוֹת תֵּמָא]] (l. ´[[אׂרְ]]:) Job 6:19; Qaiman. Mod. Teyma, NW. Arabia, Doughty:Arab.Des.i, pass.,esp. 284–299 Wilson:Hast. DB TEMA, and on inscr. found there Eut:Nab. Inschr. 35 CIS:ii.No.113.114 Nö:SBAK, 1884, 813f. Hal:RÉJ xii, 111 ff. Cooke 195 ff.
